history.narrative: Law 19-132, the “Unemployed Anti-Discrimination Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-486, which was referred to the Committee on Aging and Community Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 7, 2012, and March 6, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 19, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-329 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-132 became effective on May 31, 2012.
